title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4006.1 - Information in daily program
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4006.1 - Information in daily program

State Regulations

The names of jockeys and the post positions of their
horses, scratches, etc. shall be printed on the daily programs. When such
information is not available at the time the programs are printed, the same and
all other changes in the official program shall be posted in a conspicuous
place both in front of the clubhouse and in front of the grandstand, where the
same may be easily read by the public, and also shall be announced over the
public address system. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4006.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
